Verses: 1  melum, Sagodharare, Naan Ungalai Aavikkuriyavargalendru Enni Ungaludane Pesakkoodaamal, Maamsaththukkuriyavargalendrum, Kiristhuvukkul Kuzhandhaigalendrum Ennip Pesavendiyadhaayitru.
2  neengal Belanillaadhavargalaanadhaal, Ungalukkup Pojanankodaamal, Paalaik Kudikkakkoduththen; Innamum Neengal Maamsaththukkuriyavargalaayirukkirapadiyaal, Ippozhudhum Ungalukkup Belanillai.
3  poraamaiyum Vaakkuvaadhamum Pedhangangalum Ungalukkul Irukkirapadiyaal, Neengal Maamsaththirkuriyavargalaayirundhu Manushamaarkkamaai Nadakkireergalallavaa?
4  oruvan Naan Pavulaich Serndhavanendrum, Veroruvan Naan Appollovaich Serndhavanendrum Sollugirapadiyaal Neengal Maamsaththirkuriyavargalallavaa?
5  pavul Yaar? Appollo Yaar? Karththar Avanavanukku Arul Aliththapadiye Neengal Visuvaasikkiradharku Edhuvaayirundha Oozhiyakkaarardhaane.
6  naan Natten, Appollo Neerppaaichinaan, Dhevane Vilaiyachcheydhaar.
7  appadiyirukka, Nadugiravanaalum Ondrumillai, Neerppaaichchugiravanaalum Ondrumillai, Vilaiyachcheygira Dhevanaale Ellaamaagum.
8  melum Nadugiravanum Neerppaaichchugiravanum Ondraayirukkiraargal; Avanavan Thanthan Velaikkuth Thakkadhaaik Kooliyaip Peruvaan.
9  naangal Dhevanukku Udanvelaiyaatkalaayirukkirom; Neengal Dhevanudaiya Pannaiyum, Dhevanudaiya Maaligaiyumaayirukkireergal.

10  enakku Alikkappatta Devakirubaiyinpadiye Puththiyulla Sirpaasaariyaippola Asdhipaarampotten. Veroruvan Adhinmel Kattugiraan. Avanavan Thaan Adhinmel Innavidhamaaik Kattugiraanendru Paarkkakkadavan.
11  podappattirukkira Asdhipaaramaagiya Yesukiristhuvai Allaamal Vere Asthipaaraththaip Poda Oruvanaalum Koodaadhu.
12  oruvan Andha Asthipaaraththinmel Pon, Velli, Vilaiyerappetra Kal, Maram, Pul, Vaikkol Aagiya Ivaigalaik Kattinaal,

13  avanavanudaiya Velaippaadu Veliyaagum; Naalaanadhu Adhai Vilangappannum. Enenil Adhu Akkiniyinaale Velippaduththappadum; Avanavanudaiya Velaippaadu Eththanmaiyulladhendru Akkiniyaanadhu Parisodhikkum.
14  adhinmel Oruvan Kattinadhu Nilaiththaal, Avan Kooliyaip Peruvaan.
15  oruvan Kattinadhu Vendhuponaal, Avan Nashtamadaivaan; Avano Iratchikkappaduvaan; Adhuvum Akkiniyilakappattuth Thappinadhupolirukkum.
16  neengal Dhevanudaiya Aalayamaayirukkireergalendrum, Dhevanudaiya Aavi Ungalil Vaasamaayirukkiraarendrum Ariyaadhirukkireergalaa?
17  oruvan Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaikkeduththaal, Avanai Dhevan Keduppaar; Dhevanudaiya Aalayam Parisuththamaayirukkiradhu; Neengale Andha Aalayam.
18  oruvanum Thannaiththaane Vanjiyaadhiruppaanaaga, Ivvulagaththile Ungaliloruvan Thannai Gnaaniyendru Enninaal Avan Gnaaniyaagumpadikkup Paiththiyakkaaranaagakkadavan.
19  ivvulagaththin Gnaanam Dhevanukku Munpaagap Paiththiyamaayirukkiradhu. Appadiye, Gnaanigalai Avargaludaiya Thandhiraththile Pidikkiraarendrum,
20  gnaanikaludaiya Sindhanaigal Veenaayirukkiradhendru Karththar Arindhirukkiraarendrum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
21  ippadiyirukka, Oruvanum Manusharaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattaadhiruppaanaaga; Ellaam Ungaludaiyadhe;
22  pavulaagilum, Appollovaagilum, Kebaavaagilum, Ulagamaagilum, Jeevanaagilum Maranamaagilum, Nigazhkaariyangalaagilum, Varungaariyangalaagilum, Ellaam Ungaludaiyadhu;
23  neengal Kiristhuvinudaiyavargal; Kiristhu Dhevanudaiyavar.
